description: chop +‎ house. For Chinese customs sense, see chop (“quality”).

entries.meaning: (now chiefly historical) An inexpensive restaurant that specializes in chops or steaks; a steakhouse.
examples: Temple & his Brother & I dined in their chambers where we had dinner brought thinking it a more genteel & agreable way than in a Chophouse.

entries.meaning: A custom house in China where transit duties are levied.
examples: the South Chop-house on the southern shore of the river bears S.S.W.
